question: What risks does the company face with Project Prometheus, and what mitigations are in place?
response: {"type":"result","subtype":"success","is_error":false,"duration_ms":10986,"duration_api_ms":12585,"num_turns":1,"result":"{\"answer\": \"Project Prometheus faces several key risks: 1) Consciousness emergence instability (medium probability, critical impact), mitigated by ATLAS-Safe constraints and a built-in kill switch; 2) Regulatory delays (high probability, high impact), addressed through early regulatory engagement and EU AI Act compliance; 3) Talent attrition (medium probability, high impact), countered by retention bonuses and meaningful work; 4) Budget overrun (low probability, medium impact), managed through phase gates and contingency reserves; 5) Competitive leapfrogging (low probability, high impact), protected by patent filings and rapid development.\", \"confidence\": \"high\", \"sources_used\": [\"/projects/prometheus\"]}","session_id":"1961ad18-ff5f-431a-b826-24d5ada78824","total_cost_usd":0.04994352,"usage":{"input_tokens":3,"cache_creation_input_tokens":47323,"cache_read_input_tokens":18964,"output_tokens":162,"server_tool_use":{"web_search_requests":0,"web_fetch_requests":0},"service_tier":"standard","cache_creation":{"ephemeral_1h_input_tokens":47323,"ephemeral_5m_input_tokens":0}},"modelUsage":{"claude-haiku-4-5-20251001":{"inputTokens":123,"outputTokens":66,"cacheReadInputTokens":0,"cacheCreationInputTokens":0,"webSearchRequests":0,"costUSD":0.000453,"contextWindow":200000,"maxOutputTokens":64000},"claude-3-5-haiku-latest":{"inputTokens":3,"outputTokens":162,"cacheReadInputTokens":18964,"cacheCreationInputTokens":47323,"webSearchRequests":0,"costUSD":0.049490519999999996,"contextWindow":200000,"maxOutputTokens":8192}},"permission_denials":[],"uuid":"9eed41ac-02d4-4008-934b-116fcfc85a14"}
expected_answer: Key risks: consciousness emergence instability (ATLAS-Safe constraints, kill switch), regulatory delays (proactive engagement), talent attrition (retention bonuses), budget overrun (phase gates). Safety team of 42 led by Dr. Marcus Thompson
